CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 24, 1946, pg. 24, reads: "Busy La Joyas - Members of the well-known La Joyas Club are discussing the popularity contest which the group plans to make an annual affair. Standing (left to right) are: Bobetta Brooks, president; Eleanor Burden, Vivian Colbert and Anna Brooks; seated, Essie Williams, Charlotte Grimes and Hattie Smith.  Members not pictured are Sammie Rhone and Theodore Starling. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of members of La Joyas Club, standing: Bobetta Brooks Johnson, Eleanor Burden, Vivian Colbert, Anna Brooks; seated: Essie Mae Watson Williams, Charlotte Grimes, and Hattie Smith, in living room
